name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Distribution Period Type
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: The timeframe within which the call for applications is made
The timeframe within which an initial application for resources must be made
The timeframe within which a detailed application for resources must be made
The timeframe within which application reviews will be completed
The timeframe within which award decisions are made
The timeframe within which awards granted are notified
The timeframe within which the resources granted will be distributed
The timeframe within which any potential extensions to awards will be distributed
A timeframe for another important activity in the distribution of resources not specified in this code set
